20.heading: Darcron.
20.title: "Sinkha"
20.author: by Marco Patrito and Virtual Views, S
20.appears_in: N.C., and Strata, Inc., dba Mojave. p. 50-112 in Heavy Metal Special ; v. 10, no. 2 (Fall 1996).
notes: Summary: Hyleyn, a girl born in the city of Thalissar on the planet Ogon, wants to leave and see the universe. She gets herself taken aboard the Sinkha spaceship Darcron. At the same time both the humans and the Sinkha make disturbing discoveries about the nature of Thalissar: it was not built as a city by humans, but rather found and moved into a thousand years earlier. Thalissar is inhabited by a sleeping monster called Kahaltar. Kahaltar can tamper with the reality others perceive in order to protect itself, and uses Hyleyn as a human shield. The monster is defeated, but Hyleyn nearly dies and will need a new body generated for her.

25.title: Darcy, Miss
25.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: The Mr. Wilson informs Freck and Lard that they've whistled at Miss Darcy, the new social science teacher. He's glad they approve of the faculty, but gives them a warning.

26.title: Darcy, Miss
26.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Freckles gets a report card from Miss Darcy, grading his diplomacy, whistling, and effort. His last name is McGoosey.

27.title: Darcy, Miss
27.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Miss Darcy has no apparent sense of humor, until she reveals her new wall decoration, a print of Whistler's Mother.

28.title: Darcy, Miss
28.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: The new teacher, Miss Darcy, asks Freckles and Lard to stay after class.

29.title: Darcy, Miss
29.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Miss Darcy the teacher wants Lard and Freckles to think of her as a friend.

30.title: Darcy, Miss
30.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Miss Darcy says whistling at women might be the wrong idea, and that perhaps they should let women do some of the pursuing.

31.title: Darcy, Miss
31.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Freckles' dad responds to Miss Darcy's advice by quoting an old saying, 'A man pursues a woman until she catches him'.

32.title: Darcy, Miss
32.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Lard wonders why he always gets socked for the hamburger. ("Don't be silly, the man always pays!") Freckles remembers what Miss Darcy said, and declares a revolution.
